Hi
I've got a problem when I trie to get the first kilobyte from a 
ReplayInput Stream. The problem is: when the File is smaller then 1KB 
I'll get the hold file, if the file is bigger then 1KB I get a part 
of the file. The problem is, this part is NOT the beginning of the 
file! It's something between the beginning and the end of the file.
What's wrong?

//FYI: CrawlURI curi
ReplayInputStream ris = curi.getHttpRecorder().getRecordedInput()
                               .getContentReplayInputStream();
byte[] buffer = new byte [1024];
while (ris.read (buffer) != -1) {}
ris.close();

At the moment I'm using verry old Versions of RecordingInputStream 
and RecordingOutputStream:

- RecordingInputStream v 1.24
- RecordingOutputStream v 1.17

Was that a problem of this classes or did I something wrong?
